div.pre: 914 Kepeli (mod. Svoboda), 21 km. N of (546) Pazardzik, Bulgaria, 1906 Burial: c. 125-100 B.C.? (T) Contents: 231 AR Thasos: spread-flan tetradr.? Abydus: spread-flan tetradr.? Disposition: dispersed BSAB 4 (1914), p. 273 Le Rider, Deux tr√©sors, p. 52, note 4
